prop.name: discusses
prop.desc: Specifies the CreativeWork associated with the UserComment.

prop.name: commentTime
prop.desc: The time at which the UserComment was made.

prop.name: creator
prop.desc: The creator/author of this CreativeWork. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.

prop.name: replyToUrl
prop.desc: The URL at which a reply may be posted to the specified UserComment.
